}}'''Adalgrim Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].
==History==
Adalgrim was the only child of [[Hildigrim Took]] and [[Rosa Baggins]]. He had five children, four of them daughters. His youngest children were [[Paladin Took II|Paladin]] and [[Esmeralda Took|Esmeralda]], born in {{SR|1333}} and {{SR|1336}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Adalgrim comes from the Germanic elements ''adal'' meaning "noble" and ''grim'' meaning "fierce".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, Giving of Names, p. 191</ref>
